bibl.title: A hypomnema on Herodotus' Bk. 5: Notes to P. Oxy. LXV 4455, Col. I. English Translation by Rachel BARRITT COSTA. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Revised version of a contribution to the colloquium "La parola del poeta e la parola dell'interprete. Eruditi e grammatici nella cultura greca antica", organized by Franco MONTANARI at the "Fondation Hardt pour l'Étude de l'Antiquité Classique", Vandoeuvres (Geneva), 2nd-5th September 2008. - P. Oxy. LXV, 4455 (= M.-P.3 484.01; LDAB 1155). On the basis of some reconsiderations of the content of Col. I of the fragment and on a new reading of the text, proposes an evaluation of the hypomnema as a good level exegetic product, well informed concerning specialist historical-geographic questions.
